talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_01>Phew... You really saved me.


It's so dark around here, you can't see a
thing without a little glow. <sp:5:0:0>So don't waste
your <clr:0000>brightbloom seeds<clr:ffff> like I did!
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, and putting a seed on the ground to
hit it is all right,<sp:5:0:0> but expert explorers
<clr:0000>attach them to arrows and fire them<clr:ffff>.
Do that, and lookâ€”<sp:5:0:0>I can see your face in
the dark, clear as day!

<sp:3:0:2:0900>The face of our sworn enemy Link, that is!
talk_1041:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, hello there.<sp:5:0:0> Did they send you to
explore the Depths too? Do you have
enough <clr:0000>brightbloom seeds<clr:ffff>?
Many of our allies are using these Zonai
devices called "lights" lately,<sp:5:0:0> but it never
hurts to have <clr:0000>brightbloom seeds<clr:ffff> on hand.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>You never know when a light will go out
on you, after all.
talk_1042:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Many in our clan choose to navigate the
Depths with those Zonai lights,<sp:5:0:0> but I'll
take a <clr:0000>brightbloom seed <clr:ffff>any day.
You never know when a light might fail,
but you can always count on a seed.
talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I used up all the <clr:0000>brightbloom seeds<clr:ffff> I
brought with me.<sp:5:0:0> If you have any extra,
would you mind sharing?
talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>You can't get through here without
<clr:0000>brightbloom seeds<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0>and I used all of
mine up.
I'm sorry to ask, but if you have any on
hand, would you mind sharing?
talk_1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Sad>You're just going to leave me in the dark?
That's low, even for you.
talk_1031:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:QuestionNormal_01>You don't have any, after all...


Getting my hopes up just to dash them?
I can't think of anything crueler.
